name: Heist, You in!
description: Generated from an image of an artwork, Heist, You In is a 2D treasure hunting game set inside a museum-style procedurally generated dungeon. The image of the artwork is both the treasure that the players will seek and the source material for the procedurally generated levels of the game. The image of the artwork is the seed of the experience and becomes the basis for the level generation. In the style of a top-down 2D game, the artwork is hidden within the dungeon-styled museum interior. In the kind of dungeons, in Heist, you must find a path to the treasure and escape with it and your own life to win.
